cards.name: Plots That Span Centuries
cards.text: When you set this scheme in motion, the next time you would set a scheme in motion, set three schemes in motion instead.

cards.flavor: 探検家にとっては、かけがえのない財宝。カニにとっては、頼れる我が家。
cards.name: Ruin Crab
cards.text: Landfall - Whenever a land you control enters, each opponent mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

cards.name: Avalanche Riders
cards.text:
Haste
Echo {3}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Avalanche Riders enters, destroy target land.

cards.flavor: "I'm calling in a favor from an old friend. Once you're all dead, I'll consider the matter settled."
cards.name: Perhaps You've Met My Cohort
cards.text: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: An inferno is just a gesture away.
cards.name: Pyromancer's Gauntlet
cards.text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control or a red planeswalker you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

cards.name: Your Inescapable Doom
cards.text:
(An ongoing scheme remains face up.)
At the beginning of your end step, put a doom counter on this scheme, then this scheme deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to the opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, you choose one.

cards.name: Culling the Weak
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.

cards.flavor: "Are they dead yet? No? Then my previous order stands."
cards.name: Drench the Soil in Their Blood
cards.text: When you set this scheme in motion, after this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Imprison This Insolent Wretch
cards.text:
(An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)
When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent.
Permanents the chosen player controls don't untap during their untap step.
When the chosen player is attacked or becomes the target of a spell or ability, abandon this scheme.

cards.flavor: Grant limitless flight through the clouds, into battle, and across hardwood floors.
cards.name: Winged Boots
cards.text:
Equipped creature has flying and ward {4}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.)
Equip {1}

cards.flavor: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.
cards.name: Plague Stinger
cards.text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

cards.flavor: The heart of a golem gives life to more than just the iron husk around it.
cards.name: Golem's Heart
cards.text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: タールルームの言葉に、「驚かされる」という言い方はない。
cards.name: Talruum Champion
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Talruum Champion blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature loses first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Reminders of Memnarch's reign still skirr across Mirrodin, reminiscent of his form if not his power.
cards.name: Memnite

cards.flavor: もっとも堅牢な壁とは、石の壁でも鋼の壁でもなく、力を合わせた戦士たちの壁である。
cards.name: Shield Wall
cards.text: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Tempered Steel
cards.text: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

cards.flavor:
"Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."
-Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
cards.name: Skinrender
cards.text: When Skinrender enters, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

cards.flavor: スクイーは、同情と安堵が入り交じった気持ちで、カイレンの同類たちが死ぬのを見ていた。
cards.name: Snuff Out
cards.text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: The need to obey was inscribed on every plate in their bodies.
cards.name: Master's Call
cards.text: Create two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

cards.flavor: They watch for a new master, one more sinister than the last.
cards.name: Plague Myr
cards.text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{T}: Add {C}.

cards.flavor: It leaps from tree to tree, revealing the enemy's positions.
cards.name: Signal Pest
cards.text:
Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
Signal Pest can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

cards.flavor: 秘密を海に託してはならない。
cards.name: Gush
cards.text:
You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Draw two cards.

cards.flavor: Темный дар Чейнера еще более темной душе.
cards.name: Laquatus's Champion
cards.text:
When Laquatus's Champion enters, target player loses 6 life.
When Laquatus's Champion leaves the battlefield, that player gains 6 life.
{B}: Regenerate Laquatus's Champion.

cards.name: Rathi Assassin
cards.text:
{1}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target tapped nonblack creature.
{3}, {T}: Search your library for a Mercenary permanent card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Treasure Mage
cards.text: When Treasure Mage enters, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Black Sun's Zenith
cards.text: Put X -1/-1 counters on each creature. Shuffle Black Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

cards.flavor:
"Not again."
-Hans
cards.name: Revenant
cards.text:
Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.flavor: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.
cards.name: Fling
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

cards.flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."
cards.name: Sylvan Ranger
cards.text: When Sylvan Ranger enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: From the remnants of the dead, Geth forged a swarm to safeguard his throne.
cards.name: Vault Skirge
cards.text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Maul Splicer
cards.text:
When Maul Splicer enters, create two 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature tokens.
Golem creatures you control have trample.

cards.name: Shrine of Burning Rage
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep and whenever you cast a red spell, put a charge counter on Shrine of Burning Rage.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine of Burning Rage: It deals damage equal to the number of charge counters on it to any target.

cards.name: Priest of Urabrask
cards.text: When Priest of Urabrask enters, add {R}{R}{R}.

cards.name: Soul Collector
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Soul Collector this turn dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
Morph {B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Myr Superion
cards.text: Spend only mana produced by creatures to cast this spell.

cards.flavor: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.
cards.name: Tormented Soul
cards.text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.

cards.flavor: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."
cards.name: Auramancer
cards.text: When Auramancer enters, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?"
-Chandra Nalaar
cards.name: Circle of Flame
cards.text: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.

cards.name: Stormblood Berserker
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

cards.name: Dungrove Elder
cards.text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Dungrove Elder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.

cards.name: Jace, Memory Adept
cards.text:
[+1]: Draw a card. Target player mills a card.
[0]: Target player mills ten cards.
[−7]: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

cards.name: Ajani, Mentor of Heroes
cards.text:
[+1]: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.
[+1]: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura, creature, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[−8]: You gain 100 life.

cards.flavor: "Stay."
cards.name: Monstrous Hound
cards.text:
Monstrous Hound can't attack unless you control more lands than defending player.
Monstrous Hound can't block unless you control more lands than attacking player.

cards.flavor: "It's no challenge to master a Mercadian."
cards.name: Overtaker
cards.text: {3}{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Fungal Shambler
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Questing Phelddagrif
cards.text:
{G}: Questing Phelddagrif gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target opponent creates a 1/1 green Hippo creature token.
{W}: Questing Phelddagrif gains protection from black and from red until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life.
{U}: Questing Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, 'Alas for the living.'"
-Dal myth of the wurm
cards.name: Spined Wurm

cards.flavor: "If it is meant to be nothing but a machine," Karn finally asked Jhoira, "why did Urza build it to be like me?"
cards.name: Beast of Burden
cards.text: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield.

cards.name: Feral Throwback
cards.text:
Amplify 2 (As this creature enters, put two +1/+1 counters on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

cards.name: Silent Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Silent Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Lightning Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
{R}: Lightning Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.
cards.name: Dirtcowl Wurm
cards.text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.

cards.flavor: "Yavaimayae necesse mille annis fuit ut illa aluerent, sed modo momentum necesse fuit ut illa pretium probaverent."
cards.name: Raging Kavu
cards.text:
Flash
Haste
